listSelection.title: What? You want to make your own weapons and gloves? Seriously... it's tough to do it by yourself if you don't have experience... I'll help you out. I've been a pirate for 20 years, and for 20 years I have made various items for the crew here. It's easy for me.
As long as you bring in the materials required, I'll make you a fine Knuckler. Which Knuckler would you like to make?
As long as you bring in the materials required, I'll make you a fine Gun. Which Gun would you like to make?
As long as you bring in the materials required, I'll make you a fine glove. Which glove would you like to make?

dialogue.text:
Making one #t1482001# requires the items listed below. The level limit for this item is 15, so check and make sure you really need this item before getting it. What do you think? Do you really want one?

#i4000021# 20 #t4000021#
#i4031138# 1000 meso

Check your inventory for a free slot first.
Check and make sure you have all the necessary items to make this. Also, make sure your Equips inventory has room. I can't give you the item if your inventory is full, you know.
Check and make sure you have all the necessary items to make this. Also, make sure your Equips inventory has room. I can't give you the item if your inventory is full, you know.
All done. If you need anything else... Well, I'm not going anywhere.
